channel.title: Command on other people
channel.description:
Okay, in my server, which is Project Czar or w/e, I don't know how to make a command that works on other people.
How do I make a command like this?
Ex. : ::heal - heals another player
And you would write it in the form of ::heal playername 58
or ::heal playername (However much you want to heal the player for)
Anybody know how to do this?
Thanks in advance, Zach

item.title: Command on other people
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(“player name here”)];
if(c != null) {
// do the thing you want on the person
} else {
// dont because there is no such player and if you didn’t null-check it would throw a NullPointerException.

Read full topic
